subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jacoby Ellsbury received nothing close to the vitriol and outright hostility accorded to Johnny Damon in 2006 when he returned to Fenway Park after signing with the Yankees.
snippet: Jacoby Ellsbury received nothing close to the vitriol and outright hostility accorded to Johnny Damon in 2006 when he returned to Fenway Park after signing with the Yankees.
